original_text: then if it was done unintentionally without the knowledge of the congregation, all the congregation shall offer one bull from the herd for a burnt offering, a pleasing aroma to the Lord, with its grain offering and its drink offering, according to the rule, and one male goat for a sin offering.
korean_text: 회중이 부지중에 범죄하였거든 온 회중은 수송아지 한 마리를 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드리고 규례대로 소제와 전제를 드리고 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: then if it was done unintentionally
without the knowledge of the congregation
all the congregation shall offer one bull from the herd
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 회중은 떼에서 수소 한 마리를 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: a pleasing aroma to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and one male goat for a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 속죄제물로 수염소 한 마리를 드릴지니라
